con:testStep.name: Set Initial Program Settings for Transaction

con:restRequest.name: Set Initial Program Settings for Transaction

con:elements.con:expectedValue: HTTP/1.1 201 Created, HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed

con:restRequest.name: AddExchangeTransaction
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId":"${AddProfile#ProfileId}", "TransactionTypeCode": "EX", "TransactionNetTotal": "45", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "5", "TransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_EX", "CurrencyCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#CurrencyCode}", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date())}", "TransactionDescription": "${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "ProgramCode": "${#Project#ProgramCode}", "GrossAmount": "50", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumber1}", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumberTypeCode}", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "LineNumber": 1, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "RT" }, { "TaxAmount": "10", "DollarValueGross": "100", "DollarValueNet": "90", "ItemNumber": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumber2}", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumberTypeCode}", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 2, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "PR" } ], "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "${Process Tender Type#Response#$['TenderCode']}", "TenderAmount": "-60", "TransactionTenderCode":"TEST", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", } ] }

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: {"Headers":{"date":"Tue, 20 Sep 2022 19:29:26 GMT","server":"Apache/2.4.6 (Red Hat Enterprise Linux) OpenSSL/1.0.2k-fips","transfer-encoding":"chunked","language-code":"EN_US","x-frame-options":"DENY","pragma":"no-cache","x-content-type-options":"nosniff","x-xss-protection":"1","connection":"keep-alive","correlationid":"68ae7cc6-dad7-af88-141b-c1ce9d8ecac8","content-type":"application/json","process-time":"239ms","#status#":"HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request","cache-control":"no-store,no-cache","new-correlationid":"0HMKR4M9RA38M:0000011B"}}

con:testStep.name: Exchange with Cash tender net negative

con:restRequest.name: Exchange with Cash tender net negative
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "ProfileId":"${AddProfile#ProfileId}", "TransactionTypeCode": "EX", "TransactionNetTotal": "45", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "5", "TransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_EX", "CurrencyCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#CurrencyCode}", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date())}", "TransactionDescription": "${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "ProgramCode": "${#Project#ProgramCode}", "GrossAmount": "50", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumber1}", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumberTypeCode}", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "LineNumber": 1, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "RT" }, { "TaxAmount": "10", "DollarValueGross": "100", "DollarValueNet": "90", "ItemNumber": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumber2}", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#ItemNumberTypeCode}", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 2, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "PR" } ], "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "${Process Tender Type#Response#$['TenderCode']}", "TenderAmount": "-50", "TransactionTenderCode":"TEST", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", },
{ "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount": "-60", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}" } ] }
